title: Application metadata settings
description: Schema that describes the properties that can be configured in the application metadata json file.

processId.title: Process id
processId.description: The process id of the process model that is used by the application.

dataFields.title: Data fields
dataFields.description: The data fields that the application uses.

presentationFields.title: Presentation fields
presentationFields.description: The presentation fields that the application uses.

autoDeleteOnProcessEnd.title: Auto delete on process end
autoDeleteOnProcessEnd.description: If true, the application data will be hard deleted when the process ends.

dataTypes.title: Data types
dataTypes.description: The data types that the application uses.

validTo.title: Valid to
validTo.description: The date and time when the application is no longer valid.

validFrom.title: Valid from
validFrom.description: The date and time from when the application is valid/can be used.

org.title: Organization
org.description: The organization that owns the application.

versionId.title: Version id
versionId.description: The version id of the application.

id.title: Application id
id.description: The applications id, usually in the form of {organization}/{application-name}.

created.title: Created
created.description: The date and time when the application was created.

createdBy.title: Created by
createdBy.description: The user that created the application.

lastChanged.title: Last changed
lastChanged.description: The date and time when the application was last changed.

lastChangedBy.title: Last changed by
lastChangedBy.description: The user that last changed the application.

onEntry.title: On entry
onEntry.description: The on entry settings for the application.

show.title: Show
show.description: Determines what should be shown on entry, valid selections include: a string matching the layoutSetId.

instanceSelection.title: Instance selection
instanceSelection.description: The instance selection settings for the application.

sortDirection.title: Sort direction
sortDirection.description: The direction of sorting the list of instances, asc or desc.

rowsPerPageOptions.title: Rows per page options
rowsPerPageOptions.description: A list of options for how many rows per page should be shown.

defaultSelectedOption.title: Default selected option
defaultSelectedOption.description: The default selected option for rows per page. This value must be a valid index for the rowsPerPageOptions array.

eFormidling.title: EFormidling
eFormidling.description: Defines the eFormidling shipment contract related to an application

serviceId.title: Enabled
serviceId.description: Service identifier for the process, available services are DPO, DPV, DPF and DPI.

dpfShipmentType.title: DPF shipment type
dpfShipmentType.description: The DPF shipment type used for routing in the receiving system.

receiver.title: Description
receiver.description: Org number for the receiver of the shipment.

process.title: Process
process.description: Receiver must be able to support the process type. This is defined in receiver's capabilities.

securityLevel.title: Security level
securityLevel.description: The security level to be set for the standard business document.

dataTypes.title: Datatypes
dataTypes.description: List of ids for the data types to include in the shipment.

dataField.title: Data field
dataField.description: Holds the definition of a data field for an application, ie. a named reference to a form data field.

id.title: Id
id.description: The id of the presentation field.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path of the presentation field.

dataTypeId.title: Data type id
dataTypeId.description: The data type where the presentation field is defined.

partyTypesAllowed.title: Party types allowed
partyTypesAllowed.description: A set of settings that defines what types of parties that are allowed to instantiate an application.

bankruptcyEstate.title: Bankruptcy estate
bankruptcyEstate.description: If true, bankruptcy estates are allowed to instantiate the application.

organisation.title: Organisation
organisation.description: If true, organizations are allowed to instantiate the application.

person.title: Person
person.description: If true, persons are allowed to instantiate the application.

subUnit.title: Sub unit
subUnit.description: If true, sub units are allowed to instantiate the application.

dataType.title: Data type
dataType.description: Holds the definition of a data type for an application, ie. a named reference to a form data type.

id.title: Id
id.description: The data type id. It must be unique within the scope of an application. Logical name of the schema of which data elements should be validated against. Should be in lower case and can only contain letters, dash and numbers. No space or slashes are allowed.

allowedContentTypes.title: Allowed content types
allowedContentTypes.description: A list of allowed content types (Mime types). If null or empty all content types are allowed.

allowedContributers.title: Allowed contributers
allowedContributers.description: A list of allowed contributers. Value should be preceded by an approved key. If null or empty no contributer restrictions are set.

taskId.title: Task id
taskId.description: A reference to the process element id of the task where this data element should be updated.

maxSize.title: Max size
maxSize.description: The maximum allowed size of the file in mega bytes. If missing there is no limit on file size.

maxCount.title: Max count
maxCount.description: The maximum number of allowed elements of this type on the same application instance. Zero or below indicate unbounded maximum number of elements.

minCount.title: Min count
minCount.description: The minimum number of required elements of this type on the same application instance. Zero or below indicate that the element type is optional.

grouping.title: Grouping
grouping.description: the grouping for this data type. Can be a a string ('Photos') or a text resource key ('scheme.grouping') if the grouping name should support multiple languages. Leaving field empty means that this data element should not have it's own grouping nd will be grouped with other binary attachments that do not have defined a grouping.

enablePdfCreation.title: Enable PDF creation
enablePdfCreation.description: A value indicating whether the element should trigger PDF generation.

enableFileScan.title: Enable file scan
enableFileScan.description: A value indicating whether file uploaded to this data type should be scanned for malware.

validationErrorOnPendingFileScan.title: Validation error on pending file scan
validationErrorOnPendingFileScan.description: A value indicating wheter a file scan status of pending should trigger a validation error or not.

enabledFileAnalysers.title: Enabled file analysers
enabledFileAnalysers.description: A list of enabled file analysers this data type should be analysed against to extract metadata about the file. This metadata can in turn either be used to validate against or simply to extract metadata to add to the datamodel. The id's provided should match the id's registered with IFileAnalyser implementations registered in the application.

enabledFileValidators.title: Enabled file validators
enabledFileValidators.description: A list of enabled file validators this data type should be validated against.

languageString.title: Language string
languageString.description: A collection of data type descriptions in different languages.

applicationLogic.title: Application logic
applicationLogic.description: Holds information about how a data type representing a form is connected to a model.

autoCreate.title: Auto create
autoCreate.description: A value indicating whether the data element should be automatically created once an instance moves into the process step indicated by taskId.

classRef.title: Class ref
classRef.description: The name of the C# class used to represent the form as a model in application logic.

schemaRef.title: Schema ref
schemaRef.description: A reference to the original schema used to define the model.

allowAnonymousOnStateless.title: Allow anonymous on stateless
allowAnonymousOnStateless.description: Specifies whether anonymous access is allowed in stateless mode or not for this particular data type. Defaults to false if not specified.

autoDeleteOnProcessEnd.title: Auto delete on process end
autoDeleteOnProcessEnd.description: A property indicating if data type should be automatically marked for hard deletion on process end.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: A prefix to use to filter out shadow fields.

saveToDataType.title: Save to data type
saveToDataType.description: The data type to save filtered data (without shadow fields) to. Optional. If not set, the containing data type will be updated.

copyInstanceSettings.title: Copy instance settings
copyInstanceSettings.description: Settings for copying instance data from one instance to another.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: A value indicating if copy instance is enabled.

excludedDataTypes.title: Excluded data types
excludedDataTypes.description: A list of excluded data types.

hideSettings.title: Hide settings
hideSettings.description: Settings for hiding message box settings

hideAlways.title: Hide always
hideAlways.description: A value indicating if message box settings should be hidden always.

hiddenOnTask.title: Hidden on task
hiddenOnTask.description: A list of tasks where hide should be applied.
